relevant_findings.oral_erosions: Erosions on the inner lips and buccal mucosa, edema of the lips
relevant_findings.skin_lesions: Erythematous plaques with dusky centers on the abdomen; coalescent, erythematous, mildly scaly symmetric plaques on the back; small oval erosions in the perianal area and vagina
relevant_findings.joint_involvement: Tenderness in wrist, metacarpal, and proximal interphalangeal joints without swelling or erythema

relevant_findings.skin_lesions: Erythematous scaly plaques with central erosions on the back, chest, thighs, and buttocks, persistent and increasingly painful erosive, pruritic rash

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Skin lesions persisted; oral and anogenital lesions resolved

relevant_findings.skin_lesions: Multiple flaccid bullous lesions and superficial erosions, with crusting and mild oozing on the chest, back, abdomen, and both arms and shoulders
